name: SunLife
0:
”Alexa, ask Sun Life to submit a claim”
”Alexa, ask Sun Life to do a health check in”
”Alexa, ask Sun Life to check my workplace investments”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sun life
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the Sun Life Skill, you can:

• search for health-care providers*, 
• hear your benefits coverage information. 
• submit claims for massage therapist, physiotherapist, chiropractor, or psychologist, 
• check the status of a recently submitted claim, 
• do a health check in,
• find out how your investments are performing.

Ask for help at any time during the conversation by simply saying, “Help”. 

To get started, try saying:

• “Alexa, open Sun Life.”

PROVIDER SEARCH:

If you need to find a health-care provider, you can ask to find one. Try asking:

• “Help me find a dentist.”
• “Find me the highest rated physiotherapist.”

When you ask for a provider, we’ll automatically share details about one that’s closest to you. You can search by location, cost, and ratings. Providers can also offer appointments by phone or through video. We’ll make it easy to connect with a chosen provider by texting you their contact details. 

You’ll also notice that we may suggest Sun Life Lumino Health articles based on the kind of providers you’re looking for. If you’re interested in the article, we’ll text it to you to read. 


*Supported provider types: 
Acupuncturist, Chiropodist, Chiropractor, Clinical Counsellor, Dentist, Family Doctor, Massage therapist, Naturopath, Osteopathy, Orthodontist, Optometrist, Optical Store, Ophthalmologist, Pharmacy, Physiotherapist, Podiatrist, Psychologist, Psychotherapist, Social Worker, and Walk-in Clinic.

LINK YOUR SUN LIFE ACCOUNT

In order to access your personal account information, you’ll need to link your Sun Life account with Alexa. To enable the skill, create a 4-digit voice security PIN, which acts as layer of security. Make sure to create a different PIN than what you use for anything else.

COVERAGE INFORMATION

If you have Sun Life benefits, depending on your plan set up, you can check the remaining balance for Health Spending Account (HSA), and Personal Spending Account (PSA). You can also check the coverage details of certain health-care providers and services and get a status update of recently submitted claims. 

Try saying:

• “What is the balance of my health spending account?”
• “When can I get my next dental checkup?”
• “Is my son covered for contact lenses?”

SUBMIT A CLAIM

It’s easy and convenient to submit claims for visits with massage therapists, chiropractors, physiotherapists, and psychologists from your claim history and favourites list. You’ll also be able to pay the remaining balance automatically from your Health Spending Account (HSA).

Try saying:

• “Submit a massage therapy claim.”
• “Submit a physiotherapy claim for my daughter. 
• “What is the status of my recently submitted claim?”

HEALTH CHECK IN

You can now complete a Health Check In to stay on top of your health and well being. We’ll ask you a few questions and suggest resources based on your needs.


CHECK WORKPLACE INVESTMENTS BALANCE

If you have a Sun Life retirement plan, depending on your plan set up, you can check the balance and personal rates of return of your workplace investments. 

Try saying:

• “Check my workplace investments balance.”
• “Check my RRSP balance.”
• “What is the rate of return of my workplace investments?”

Note that your financial information will be read aloud and or displayed visually, so be careful about your surroundings when checking your information.

For additional information and Frequently Asked Questions, visit sunlife.ca/speaktosunlife.
We’re always looking to improve the Sun Life skill to better suit your needs. You may be asked to provide feedback during your voice session. If you’d like to share any comments or feedback, please reach out to alexa.support@sunlife.com.
